original_text: For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.
korean_text: 너희가 사람의 잘못을 용서하면 너희 하늘 아버지께서도 너희 잘못을 용서하시려니와

sentences.original_text: For if you forgive other people
your heavenly Father will also forgive you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하늘 아버지께서도 당신을 용서하실 것입니다
